user_profile: You are a single, mid-20s-to-30s animal lover living in San Francisco with a rescue dog. You are vegan and volunteer with the local SPCA. You’re a big basketball fan (especially the Warriors) and enjoy spending weekends hiking and trying new plant-based spots around the Bay. You’re budget-conscious but willing to pay for good seat value and convenience.
task_description: Help the user choose a Warriors home game to attend next month, compare seating options for best value and view, verify vegan concession choices at Chase Center, and arrange reliable overnight dog boarding near the arena.
first_user_prompt: I want to catch a Warriors home game next month. Can you help me pick the best matchup and find good-value seats with a solid view? I’m vegan and need to sort out overnight dog boarding too.
